channel.title: Everyday Entrepreneur Podcast
channel.description: 🎙️ Everyday Entrepreneurs is the podcast that reveals the stories, strategies, and lessons behind the greatest entrepreneurial successes. Every week, discover how simple ideas turned into empires — and how you can find inspiration to build your own path. No complicated jargon, no empty theories: here, we talk business clearly, directly, and authentically. Whether you're a student, a creator, an employee, or an aspiring entrepreneur, Everyday Entrepreneurs is your go-to show to learn, get inspired, and dream big. 🚀
channel.itunes:author: Maxence Royer
